name: Tilt (Frusco)
description:
Tilt is a prototype puzzle-game inspired to the kororinpa game series. Use your android device to roll the ball trough 10 single player demo levels or try the couch multiplayer tech demo with your friends.

How to play

  1. Make sure your PC and your Android Device are connected to the same network
  2. Tilt your Android Device to roll the ball
  3. Press ESC to return to the main menu, R to restart the level

Trouble Shouting

  • My Android Device suddenly exits the app:
    • It could happen on PC with slow loading time, just reopen the app and it should works fine
  • LAGGGGGGGG
    • Make sure to have a good Wi-Fi signal ☜(ﾟヮﾟ☜)

What next:

  • Physics based puzzles!
  • Multiplayer mini-games!
  • Sphere personalization!
  • New Biomes!
